definition: Mandate of Heaven/the Grand Canal, 1800 km from Beijing to Hangzhou, built starting from 486 BC/usually written 大運河|大运河[Da4 Yun4 he2]
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
to move/to transport/to use/to apply/fortune/luck/fate
the Grand Canal, 1800 km from Beijing to Hangzhou, built starting from 486 BC
to have a lucky stroke/to try one's luck
the Grand Canal, 1800 km from Beijing to Hangzhou, built starting from 486 BC

sentences.english: With the chance of Universiade, Shenzhen proposes to build a voluntary city with the effort of all citizens.
sentences.chinese: 借大運會契機，深圳提出全民共建“志願之城”。
因爲我們選擇了綠色大運。

sentences.english: The Opening Ceremony of the Universiade is in Nanshan District.
sentences.chinese: 大運會開幕式在南山區。

sentences.english: A large complete bottom note LOGO.
What do I need to access to Internet at Dayuncun Foreign Students Dormitory?
sentences.chinese: 大運村留學生公寓正常使用互聯網的必備條件有那些？

sentences.english: I believe that the Universiade in Shenzhen will also be a success.
sentences.chinese: 我相信深圳大運會也會很成功。

sentences.english: The Grand Canal joins the Haihe at Tianjin.
sentences.chinese: 大運河在天津與海河匯合。

sentences.english: The painting depicts the Grand Canal, Venice, looking north from the Rialto Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 這幅畫描繪的是從里亞託橋向北望的威尼斯大運河。

sentences.english: The Universiade torch is expected to be lit at the prestigious Qinghua University in Beijing in April.
sentences.chinese: 本次大運會火炬將於4月在北京的清華大學點燃。

sentences.english: More than that, he is a role model: he excels in “managing serendipity”.
sentences.chinese: 更有甚者，他還是一個“善於把握大運”的榜樣呢。

sentences.english: The canal connects Beijing with Hangzhou, 800 miles to the south.
sentences.chinese: 大運河連接北京和南方的杭州，兩地相距800英里。

sentences.english: The Beidaihe inland water transportation is extremely developed, it is interlinked with the Beijing-Hangzhou Canal.
sentences.chinese: 北戴河內河運輸十分發達，與京杭大運河相通。

sentences.english: Yes, there are only As citizens, what can we do for the Universiade?
sentences.chinese: 那作爲市民，我們可以爲大運會做點什麼呢？

sentences.english: Huang said she and her teachers had been involved in designing the costumes for Universiade guides.
sentences.chinese: 黃秋蓉的同學和老師都曾參與大運引導員制服設計。

sentences.english: The Grand Canal of China enters Shandong from the northwest and leaves on the southwest.
sentences.chinese: 京杭大運河自西北向西南流經山東省。

sentences.english: Wuzhen, , an ancient water town in Zhejiang, lies at the riverside of Beijing-Hangzhou Grand Canal.
sentences.chinese: 烏鎮是浙江的一座古老的水鎮，坐落在京杭大運河畔。
